oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brother and Student
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: De La Salle Christian Brothers; College presidents; students
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brother Lawrence David (Christian Brothers College president, 1941-1947) conducted an interview with student, Jim Bowen.
